name: Akiko F.
text: Johnathon is absolutely the best. He sent me so many updates and pictures and kept me so informed about my pup. I was not worried in the least bit. I highly recommend.

name: Vicky L.
text: My dog has literally never been happier to see anyone in his life than when I dropped him off with Jonathan again. He truly is the best and I never have to worry about anything when I’m out of town, so I really appreciate the peace of mind.

name: Missy R.
text: Johnny is super knowledgeable in dog care, safety, and comfort. We got regular updates and he has a perfect setup for his full-time business as a dog sitter. Apollo loved his stay and made bunches of new friends. Highly recommend!

name: KK V.
text: We left our dogs with Jonathan for 2 weeks and they had a wonderful time. He followed all our feeding and medication instructions and even offered fun add-ons like baths and sniffari walks. Truly professional and caring—absolutely recommend.

name: Deena F.
text: This is our second time using Johnny to take care of Coconut and he is just amazing. He goes above and beyond and makes sure we feel comfortable while we travel. He even plays cute games with her to keep her engaged!

name: Kerry B.
text: Johnny is amazing! Our dog doesn’t do well in kennels, but she was so happy with Johnny. We received daily photo and video updates and could tell she was thriving. We’ll definitely use Johnny again!

name: Alice G.
text: Jonathan sent us frequent updates and cute photos and videos. Our dogs were relaxed and happy when we picked them up after two weeks—such a great experience!

name: Vicky L.
text: Jonathan is amazing! He is super quick to respond, has a wonderful clean place, and Thanos absolutely loved him to pieces. I’m not sure Thanos even wanted to come home.

name: Akiko F.
text: Johnathon is the best!!!! I was so nervous about leaving my baby but it went so smoothly. His communication was exceptional. Archie will be staying again for a whole week. Definitely recommend him!!!!

name: Jonathan M.
text: Our anxious rescue dog stayed with Johnny and did great. We appreciated the detailed updates and his ability to work with dogs who need a little extra love. Total pro!
